title: Witch Doctor
summaries: The Witch Doctor is an NPC vendor that will spawn once the following criteria have been met:

• There is an empty house.
  • Queen Bee has been defeated.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Witch Doctor will shoot Poison Darts at nearby enemies with a Blowgun to defend himself. In addition to poisoning enemies, his darts deal 20 / <abbr class="expert" title="Expert Mode">30</abbr> / <abbr class="master" title="Master Mode">35</abbr> damage at the start of the game, and (on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version) as players progress he will gain various stat increases.

statistics.Damage: 203035 (Poison Dart)
